title: Introducing: Atlantic & Lion
content:
There’s very little information out there about Atlantic & Lion, other than the fact they may or may not be based in Brighton.

However for now these are mere periphery details, as Atlantic & Lion‘s ‘I Forgot to Say‘ is a track that can speak very much on it’s own accord. Fuzzy vocals are engrossed by jaunty guitars, built amongst a background of garage rock goodness. While the track could easily be cropped to the more recognizable four minute mark, the final two minutes provide a blistering period of guitar “shredding” that propels the record from engaging and pleasant, to an experience I’m craving to see live.

You can currently download ‘I Forgot to Say‘ for free on the band’s bandcamp
